item.title: 独家：消息人士称，雅虎接近达成以 14 亿美元将 AOL 出售给意大利 Bending Spoons 公司的交易
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，雅虎正在与意大利技术公司 Bending Spoons 就以约 14 亿美元的价格出售美国在线进行深入谈判，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）支持的雅虎将甩掉早期互联网时代最知名的公司之一。【原文：Yahoo is in advanced talks to sell AOL to Italian technology company Bending Spoons for about $1.4 billion, four sources familiar with the matter said, as the Apollo Global Management -backed firm sheds one of the most recognizable names of the early internet era.】

item.title: 交易日：关门？股票上涨
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets.】

item.title: Grindr 任命资深高管约翰-诺斯为财务总监
item.description: 约会应用 Grindr 周三任命约翰-诺斯（John North）为财务总监，接替凡娜-克兰茨（Vanna Krantz）。【原文：Dating app Grindr on Wednesday named John North as its finance chief, replacing Vanna Krantz.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司在最大猪肉价格垄断案中支付 8500 万美元
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods）同意支付 8500 万美元，以了结消费者指控这家美国最大肉类公司与竞争对手合谋，通过限制 200 亿美元美国市场的供应来抬高猪肉价格的诉讼。【原文：Tyson Foods agreed to pay $85 million to settle a lawsuit by consumers who accused the largest U.S. meat company of conspiring with rivals to inflate pork prices by limiting supply in the $20 billion U.S. market.】

item.title: 马斯克成为净资产达到 5000 亿美元的第一人
item.description: 根据福布斯亿万富豪指数，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三成为历史上首位净资产达到近 5000 亿美元的人。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday became the first person in history to achieve a net worth of nearly $500 billion, according to Forbes' billionaires index.】

item.title: 美国政府关门带来不确定性，但很少对经济产生持久影响
item.description: 在美联储等政策制定者对美国就业市场的健康状况、通胀轨迹以及消费者支出和企业投资力度存在不确定性和分歧之际，美国政府的停摆为联邦经济数据的流动踩下了刹车。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown has thrown the brakes on the flow of federal economic data at a moment of uncertainty and division among policymakers like those at the Federal Reserve about the health of the U.S. job market, the trajectory of inflation and the strength of consumer spending and business investment.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，KKR 探讨以 70 亿美元出售加拿大彭宾纳天然气基础设施公司的股份
item.description: 四位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，KKR 正在探索出售其在彭比纳天然气基础设施公司（Pembina Gas Infrastructure）40% 股份的可能性，预计其在这家加拿大中游运营商的持股价值约为 70 亿美元。【原文：KKR is exploring a potential sale of its 40% stake in Pembina Gas Infrastructure, with its holding in the Canadian midstream operator expected to be valued at around $7 billion, four people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，亿万富翁阿斯内斯的 AQR 多策略基金 2025 年迄今大涨 15.6
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，亿万富翁投资者克里夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）的 AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）旗下多只基金在第三季度取得了正收益。【原文：Billionaire investor Cliff Asness's AQR Capital Management finished the third quarter with positive returns in several of its funds, a person familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白宫警告：如果停摆持续下去，裁员迫在眉睫
item.description: 白宫周三警告说，随着政府关门第一天的到来，裁员迫在眉睫，尽管副总统JD Vance坚称尚未做出最终决定。【原文：The White House warned on Wednesday that worker layoffs are imminent as the first day of the government shutdown unfolded, even as Vice President JD Vance insisted no final decisions have been made.】

item.title: 福特在南非的裁员与英国税收调整和销量下降有关
item.description: 福特汽车南非分公司将裁员计划归因于其 Ranger 皮卡在欧洲的订单减少，原因是英国最近的税收变化以及插电式混合动力 Ranger 车型出口量低迷。【原文：The South African arm of Ford Motor has attributed the planned retrenchments to lower European orders for its Ranger pickup truck, driven by recent tax changes in the UK and sluggish export volumes for its plug-in hybrid Ranger model.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，英特尔正在就将 AMD 增列为代工客户进行早期谈判
item.description: 据 Semafor 周三援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，英特尔正在就将 AMD 增列为代工客户进行早期谈判。【原文：Intel is in early talks to add AMD as a foundry customer, Semafor reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 惠誉：美国政府关门短期内不太可能影响主权评级
item.description: 惠誉周三表示，预计美国政府目前的停摆不会在短期内影响到美国的主权评级，并补充说，对经济增长的任何影响都将取决于停摆的范围和持续时间。【原文：Fitch said on Wednesday it does not expect the ongoing U.S. government shutdown to affect the country's sovereign ratings in the near term, adding that any impact on economic growth would depend on its scope and duration.】

item.title: 在加拿大央行 9 月 17 日利率决议之前，委员们预计他们可能会在 10 月货币政策报告中提出对经济增长和通货膨胀的基线预测 - 讨论纪要
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: First Brands 获得破产法官批准 5 亿美元救援融资
item.description: 破产汽车供应商 First Brands 周三获得了美国法官的许可，可以进行 11 亿美元破产贷款的第一阶段工作，在该公司努力重组长期债务的同时，可立即获得 5 亿美元的资金注入。【原文：Bankrupt auto supplier First Brands on Wednesday received a U.S. judge's permission to proceed with the first phase of a $1.1 billion bankruptcy loan, giving the company an immediate infusion of $500 million as it tries to reorganize its longer-term debt.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，人工智能数据分析初创公司 Dataiku 已选定在美国上市的银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，人工智能数据分析初创公司 Dataiku 已聘请投资银行推进首次公开募股。【原文：Dataiku, an artificial intelligence data analytics startup, has hired investment banks to push ahead with an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲炼油厂押宝绿色项目以确保长远未来
item.description: 炼油行业高管周三表示，由于亚洲、中东和非洲的竞争对手更加现代化和复杂化，欧洲炼油厂不得不投资能源转型项目，从而导致欧洲工厂关闭。【原文：European oil refineries are having to invest in energy transition projects as modern and more complex competitors in Asia, the Middle East and Africa have prompted plant closures in Europe, refining industry executives said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汽车企业高管担心美国税收补贴消失导致电动汽车销售崩溃
item.description: 在为电动汽车购买者提供的 7500 美元关键税收减免政策消失后，汽车业高管正为美国电动汽车销售的自由落体做好准备。【原文：Automotive executives are bracing for a freefall in U.S. electric-vehicle sales following the disappearance of a critical $7,500 tax break for buyers.】

item.title: 自动驾驶卡车公司 Einride 融资 1 亿美元
item.description: 瑞典自动驾驶卡车初创公司 Einride 在最新一轮融资中筹集了约 1 亿美元，投资方包括资产管理公司 EQT Ventures 和量子计算公司 IonQ，估值未公开。【原文：Swedish self-driving truck startup Einride has raised around $100 million in the latest funding round from investors, including asset management firm EQT Ventures and quantum computing company IonQ , at an undisclosed valuation.】

item.title: 微软任命首席执行官负责商业业务，纳德拉将专注于技术领域
item.description: 微软首席商务官贾德森-阿尔索夫（Judson Althoff）将担任商业业务首席执行官一职，这将使公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）腾出手来，更加专注于技术方面的业务，从而使这家科技巨头在人工智能竞赛中占据主导地位。【原文：Microsoft Chief Commercial Officer Judson Althoff will take on an expanded role as CEO of commercial business, freeing up company chief Satya Nadella to focus more on the technical side of the business in the tech giant's quest to dominate the AI race.】

item.title: 5000 亿美元 "星际之门 "人工智能项目的主要利益攸关方
item.description: 星际之门是一项耗资 5000 亿美元的人工智能基础设施计划，是华盛顿推动在该领域占据主导地位的核心，自今年 1 月启动以来，已吸引了众多投资者和供应商。【原文：Stargate, a $500 billion AI infrastructure initiative that is central to Washington's push for dominance in the field, has drawn a slew of investors and suppliers since its launch in January.】

item.title: 美国政府信用违约掉期利差走高
item.description: 美国政府信用违约掉期的利差（以市场为基础衡量主权违约风险的指标）在市场对美国政府停摆的担忧中走高。【原文：Spreads on U.S. government credit default swaps, market-based gauges of the risk of a sovereign default, have ticked higher amid market concerns over the U.S. government shutdown.】

item.title: 微软推出人工智能驱动的 365 Premium 捆绑包，每月 19.99 美元
item.description: 微软周三发布了面向个人的 365 Premium 订阅计划，每月 19.99 美元，并配备了由人工智能驱动的 Copilot 助手。【原文：Microsoft on Wednesday unveiled a 365 Premium subscription plan for individuals at $19.99 a month with its Copilot artificial intelligence powered assistant.】

item.title: 特斯拉 9 月份在意大利的新车销量下降 25.6
item.description: 意大利交通部周三公布的数据显示，9月份特斯拉在意大利的新车注册量连续第五个月下降，同比降幅达25.6%。【原文：Tesla's new car registrations in Italy fell for a fifth month in a row in September, posting a 25.6% year-on-year drop, data from the Italian transport ministry showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: Cucinelli 重申其在俄罗斯的运营符合欧盟规则
item.description: 意大利奢侈品公司布鲁内罗-库奇内利（Brunello Cucinelli）周三重申，该公司在俄罗斯的运营完全符合欧盟规定，第三季度收入增长了 12%，达到 3.36 亿欧元（约合 3.94 亿美元）。【原文：Italian luxury company Brunello Cucinelli reaffirmed on Wednesday that it operated in Russia in full compliance with EU regulations, as it posted a 12% increase in revenues in the third quarter, to 336 million euros ($394 million).】

item.title: 海王星保险公司估值超过 30 亿美元，股价在纽交所首次亮相时大涨
item.description: 海王保险股价周三在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时大涨 12.5%，公司估值近 31.1 亿美元，成为最新一家利用繁荣上市市场的保险公司。【原文：Neptune Insurance shares jumped 12.5% in their New York Stock Exchange debut on Wednesday, valuing the company at nearly $3.11 billion and making it the latest insurer to capitalize on a buoyant listings market.】

item.title: 微软将 Xbox Game Pass 最高订阅费用提高 50
item.description: 微软公司的 Xbox 已将 Game Pass 最高级别的价格提高了 50%，并扩大了电子游戏订阅服务的产品范围，包括更多游戏、增强型云流媒体和经过改进的奖励系统。【原文：Microsoft's Xbox has raised the price of the highest tier of Game Pass by 50% and expanded its offerings under the videogame subscription service to include more games, enhanced cloud streaming and a revamped rewards system.】

item.title: 独家报道无人机袭击后俄罗斯西部港口石油出口增长 25
item.description: 据三位贸易消息人士称，由于乌克兰无人机袭击导致炼油厂停工，释放了更多原油，俄罗斯 9 月份通过其西部港口的石油出口量比 8 月份增加了 25%。【原文：Russia boosted oil exports via its western ports by 25% in September versus August, according to three trading sources, as refinery outages caused by Ukrainian drone attacks freed up more crude.】

item.title: 德国大陆集团预计下半年关税将达到 "两位数百万欧元"。
item.description: 德国大陆集团（Continental AG）周三表示，预计 2025 年下半年将受到美国关税 "高达两位数百万欧元 "的冲击，并补充说这已经考虑到了自 8 月份起追溯到 15%的关税削减。【原文：Continental AG expects a "high double-digit million-euro" hit from U.S. tariffs in the second half of 2025, it said on Wednesday, adding this already factored in a retroactive cut to 15% as of August.】

item.title: 金刚石公司首席执行官认为美国原油产量增长将因每桶 60 美元的油价而停滞不前
item.description: 美国顶级石油生产商之一钻石能源公司（Diamondback Energy）的首席执行官周三表示，如果油价维持在每桶 60 美元附近，美国石油产量的增长将停滞不前，因为在这一水平上有利可图的钻井地点越来越少。【原文：U.S. oil production growth will stall if prices stay near $60 per barrel, as fewer drilling sites are profitable at that level, the CEO of Diamondback Energy , one of the country's top oil producers, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车第三季度美国汽车销量增长约 8
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周三公布，受电动汽车和 SUV 需求强劲的推动，其第三季度美国汽车销量增长了 7.7%。【原文：General Motors reported a 7.7% rise in its U.S. auto sales during the third-quarter on Wednesday, aided by strong demand for electric vehicles and SUVs.】
